interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Devices.RobotCleaner
interface.description: This interface provides capabilities to control and monitor robot cleaner specific functions and resources.

property.name: SupportedOperationalCycleIds
property.description: Array of supported operational cycle identifiers

property.name: SelectableOperationalCycleIds
property.description: Array of selectable operational cycle indetifiers

property.name: SupportedCyclePhaseIds
property.description: Array of supported cycle phase identifiers

property.name: SelectableCyclePhaseIds
property.description: Array of selectable cycle phase identifiers

property.name: TurboMode
property.description: Represent enabled/disabled state of more powerful cleaning mode.

property.name: RepeatMode
property.description: Represent enabled/disabled state of the repeat mode.If enabled, robot cleaner will continously clean until the battery runs off.

method.name: SetOperationalCycleId
method.description: Invoke this method to set an operational cycle identifier

method.name: GetOperationalCyclesDescription
method.description: Invoke this method to get operational cycles descriptions

method.name: GetCyclePhasesDescription
method.description: Invoke this method to get cyecl phases descriptions is string format

method.name: EnableTurboMode
method.description: Invoke this method to enable/disable the turbo mode

method.name: EnableRepeatMode
method.description: Invoke this method to eable/disable the repeate mode
